reviewText: Good DVD for anyone interested in getting started playing golf. Easy to follow directions, and an excellent reference for the beginner.

This video is set at some awesome looking resort golf course in Tucson
Arizona and the teacher, Scott Barrett is excellent. I have 2 of his DVD's and both are good.
He has an easygoing, relaxed style, but he really knows his stuff. Would recommend any of
his videos.
very simple- as the title states- really helps to focus on just a few things about your swing- very happy with this dvd!
Great golf dvd shows the golf swing in a very clear easy to understand way A+.
